website_summaries.verdict: A quality nylon wig cap that stays in place well and is comfortable to wear.
pros: A 'one size fits all' design suits most head types
Made from stretchable nylon, which is comfortable to wear for longer periods
Quality stitching and built for repeated uses

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit, even for head that is larger than “one size fits most” items.
customer_reviews.author: Laurieanne Abernathy

customer_reviews.title: Great Price - $9.99 for 24 Wig Caps
customer_reviews.text: It’s the average wig cap found at the local beauty supply. But this is great for protecting my hair under wigs and the thin stocking material allows for the scalp to breath. Fits nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Leelee

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first purchase of a wig cap. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: Way too small "one size fits all!"
customer_reviews.text: I put this tight skull cap on, then put my wig, and hat and went to a social outing. Much to my embarresment, within one hour, I had to take the product off as it was way too tight and gave me a tremendous headache. I had to take the wig off too since it was one without hair up top and hair which only came down along the sides meant to wear with a hat. So, I just wore the hat which was far from a hat to be worn alone with no hair! Anyway, I am a small 110 pound person and if this product didn't fit me, it's not going to fit anybody, IMO!
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Very thin- almost like a sheer nylon vs a thick tight
customer_reviews.text: Very thin- almost like a sheer nylon vs. a thick tight. Which causes you to still feel the wig - creating an itch. I am used to wig caps being a lot thicker. The purpose is to protect the hair. This nylon is too thin to protect the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fitting cap that works
customer_reviews.text: Who knew that something so simple (It looks like the same material as the nylons I wear under dresses) would hold hair back so well. It holds my daughters short hair back well and even fit her friend who has long thick hair back. My daughter prefers this type of cap, but her friend prefers the tickers mesh looking ones. Since it's made of the same material as nylons I would assume it would be prone to getting runs and have to be replaced every so often, but at this price you can replace it without breaking the budget. Both girls said it fit their heads comfortably and had no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Cote

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and stretchable
customer_reviews.text: These cap fit perfectly on my head. - nice nylon quality - stretchable to fit my head But be careful not to wear it over any hair pin on your hair. Sharp object will cut it apart. Other than that it is a good product and met my needs. Will definitely buy more when the current one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: They Work.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no problems - mother-in-law uses these and we've gotten several new ones for her - they do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D

customer_reviews.title: The wife's Fav. brand
customer_reviews.text: never had issues with this brand and is what we can always order and know it will work for her!
customer_reviews.author: Soulreaper8402

customer_reviews.title: too light
customer_reviews.text: I order from this vendor before. the caps i received are too light.
customer_reviews.author: Deania Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Price/quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product, but I wished it came in a darker color.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Giles

customer_reviews.title: Good cap. Doesn’t last long though
customer_reviews.text: Typical cap. Love the color but it doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.author: LoveSam

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was different from my skin tone I needed some darker
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I ordered, very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for when I use my wigs since they are Blonde
customer_reviews.author: Michelle hollon

customer_reviews.title: Fits comfortable, BUT way too much hassle to wear
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and feels comfortable. It's not too tight that it gives me a headache. The problem is the material snags easily and catches on the net inside my wig making it very difficult to put on, move, adjust my wig and it feel OK with leaving the house. So, I may as not even wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Wig Cap
customer_reviews.text: I love the wig cap it fits really well... I will be buying more of these wig caps.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what it is supposed to be
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is supposed to be and it works just fine with my wig.
customer_reviews.author: M. Manny

customer_reviews.title: Holds on good and right now is working as a bag for ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds on good and right now is working as a bag for my wig and so far still as good as when i put it in
customer_reviews.author: Sary Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Would slide off my head at times, but overall stayed in place for the majority of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Desarae

customer_reviews.title: Wig and caps
customer_reviews.text: I received a lace front wig with the wig caps? I’m so confused.
customer_reviews.author: Jean w

customer_reviews.title: Just like picture.
customer_reviews.text: This wig cap is very comfortable and covers well. It has no holes in it so it may be too warm for hot summers.
customer_reviews.author: Terry N.

customer_reviews.title: A little thin
customer_reviews.text: A little thinner than I would have liked but it still does what it’s supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Adrii

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price and very fast service by this merchant, I was please with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it and it did not keep my hair tight. It kept falling out. No worth the money
customer_reviews.author: mtanusha

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. I can wear my wig with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Worked well. Reasonably priced and delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: bbbass1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Stays in place and not too tight or uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Port Isabel Fashion Diva

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. This product does nothing to help a wig ...
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. This product does nothing to help a wig stay on one's head. Thank God I didn't pay that much. So it just goes to show you-- you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Patti A. Reali

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item received
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive correct item, received disposable socks instead of wig cap that was ordered
customer_reviews.author: Sean Smith

customer_reviews.title: it is very comfortable, and stays in tact very well
customer_reviews.text: fits my head perfectly, it is very comfortable, and stays in tact very well.
customer_reviews.author: Teagan Prunty

customer_reviews.title: ... of my recent item thru Amazon as been greatly satisfied. Your follow up is greatly appreciated
customer_reviews.text: All of my recent item thru Amazon as been greatly satisfied. Your follow up is greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: kealoha sugiyama

customer_reviews.title: Ok cap for short hair
customer_reviews.text: I think that this is an "OK" product. It made the wig fit more snuggly but it also made me very hot. For me, a velvet band works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Madhamma

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This item is really just panty hose . However they where a lil better then some I have used. Use bobby pins helps it stay on better.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any complication. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Redeait

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough to hold my hair
customer_reviews.text: The net was not strong enough to hold my hair and kept coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Mami

customer_reviews.title: delivery was fine..
customer_reviews.text: I only receiced one in the pkg, And it was,nt what I thought it would be,..delivery was fine ..
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Marineau

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This cap definitely held up throughout the night. I also have long caucasian hair and it still worked. And not to mention the price is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna25 E.

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all
customer_reviews.text: It is just a nylon stocking cut and sewn at one end. I does not stay on. It does not look like the picture at all. Initially shipping was free but after purchasing got charged for shipping. I found a better one at Party City for the same price with out the shipping.
customer_reviews.author: battery may

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: These caps definitely serve their purpose. I am not an avid wig-wearer, so I wasn't sure how to go about properly wearing one. These caps fit perfectly and were snug enough to stay in place while wearing a heavy wig. 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Marlena

customer_reviews.title: fair
customer_reviews.text: rides up underneath the wig and wig rides up with it..not comfortable..hail mary full of grace...God bless America! Go USA!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Graham

customer_reviews.title: Worked well but really is made for A LOT of hair
customer_reviews.text: Wig cap worked really well but is really made for A LOT of hair, just for you information. sdfs sdfs
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Andrews

customer_reviews.title: I hate this wig cap
customer_reviews.text: I hate this wig cap. I thought that I ordered silk wig cap but I received polyester. And the color was the worst. Nobody has orange skin color.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bariya

customer_reviews.title: It's a quick solution but not the best
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. 1st of all it rolls back its a lil tight gave me a headache
customer_reviews.author: marjorie sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I wear these under my wigs. They are comfortable and the color is perfect. Fits just right.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: Great for lace wig installations
customer_reviews.text: I use this cap for my wig installations. I do need makeup on this cap because it is too yellow. But it is sturdy material and is a great cap for my wigs.
customer_reviews.author: Cici R.

customer_reviews.title: Fits like it should, seems to be good quality
customer_reviews.text: Does what wig caps are supposed to do. Arrived a day late but amazon seems to think it hasn’t arrived yet lol. Happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Herring

customer_reviews.title: Too tight & hot
customer_reviews.text: Gave me a headache so I cut the edge. No more headaches but hot. Probably to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: Good value wig caps.
customer_reviews.text: A nice sheer wig cap. I prefer these to the fishnet type. This came with two caps and were nice and easy to put on and keep on. I used them under a wig and a bald cap and both times they performed.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a chopped off pantyhose like you would use to rob a
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a wig liner. This is a chopped off pantyhose like you would use to rob a bank
customer_reviews.author: sisterintheup

customer_reviews.title: Nice wig caps
customer_reviews.text: This wig cap worked better than I expected. I have really long, thick, soft hair and I managed to stuff it all in this cap. I had to use a couple bobby pins to hold it in place, but I figured that was normal. I only used it once because I don't know if you can reuse it.
customer_reviews.author: Paigeb

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: A waste of money. This is just a pack of stocking caps that will take out your hair. I was expecting tan spandex wig caps.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre B

customer_reviews.title: Mostly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These are wig caps- they're pretty much what I expected. I will mention that one of these developed a run on just the second wear, which was a little disappointing, but all in all these are what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable under my wigs. Has held up through a bunch of washes.
customer_reviews.author: Bethy

customer_reviews.title: Held my long hair up well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep my hair under wraps under my wig for Halloween. It worked great! My hair is pretty long (past down the middle of my back) and it stayed put all night. It was also soft so that was really nice. It came with two wig caps, so that helped keep my long hair in place.
customer_reviews.author: Stellar Fish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for such a cheap product. Held my long hair with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: it fit on my head but not over my face so I didn't look like I was about to rob a bank
customer_reviews.text: it's a cap made out hosery.... it fit on my head but not over my face so I didn't look like I was about to rob a bank. Didn't get arrested so I'm happy with product
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Vestal

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear over my hairpiece when I sleep in it. They keep the hair from getting damaged by your pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Bowen Stewart

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I'd have done better using a plastic bag, Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: great wig cap - a little big for me
customer_reviews.text: Great wig cap, but I do have a small head, so it was a bit big on me, but overal good quality!
customer_reviews.author: claudiajs227

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: all my mass of hair fit and the wig looked great
customer_reviews.author: mh74

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Mom is so pleased she wears it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Joeunico

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: İ bought this expecting 12 caps but saw individual caps were doubled to make 24. For the price I am more satisfied, it's way cheaper even for 12 caps. If you are a wig wearer or tie scarfs buy this lot. I have been using one since it arrived, I have long nails and I haven't pierced it. I can wear it a whole day and forget it's there. Nice quality and really fits all because it strech
customer_reviews.author: Blessing

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: I'm dabbling in the world of cosplay for the first time in a long time, so I needed a wig cap to help hold my hair in for my wigs. My hair is either too heavy or my head is too weirdly shaped, but I have a hard time keeping these on, especially when my wig is on. I guess it's a learning experience. ;) If anyone has any advice for keeping these on, please send a message!
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit
customer_reviews.text: This cap color has been hard to find locally. Guess the color is very popular. I love the fit, and material.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Wimberly

customer_reviews.title: big!
customer_reviews.text: it's big, it's a good weight, it covers well. It is a good shade too - medium fair. it is strong
customer_reviews.author: Leonora A. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Looks Natural
customer_reviews.text: This wig cap gives me a natural looking part in my lace front wig and it also fits on my head without falling off love it
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: just what you expect
customer_reviews.text: fits med size heads well. worked well for keeping my wig on for halloween party. Panty hose material, bobby pins, and a little wig tape around the forehead worked great.
customer_reviews.author: tracey miner

customer_reviews.title: Worked and Fit great...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in her high school musical and we needed a good hair wig that would hold her extremely long hair. This one worked great. It stretched to cover all of her hair. I am very glad that I went with the deluxe because of the length and thickness for her hair. It is also great that two wig caps come in the package so we have a backup in case something happens and we loose one.
customer_reviews.author: piercka1

customer_reviews.title: DREAM Deluxe Wig Cap Natural 2 pc (Model: 097NA)
customer_reviews.text: would recommend to anyone. Works well for me. Gets a bit warm after a long wear. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dellis

customer_reviews.title: Dream Deluxe Wig Cap
customer_reviews.text: I used this wig cap for a Halloween costume, and thought that by paying more money I would get a highter quality cap. I would say that if you consider a one time use good, then this is your product. But, if really does stretch out!
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Great cap!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, keeps hair in place and doesn't slip around.. I really enjoy it when I'm in the mood for the bald look also!
customer_reviews.author: shorty

customer_reviews.title: I like the ones with holes
customer_reviews.text: they won't stay on the head..way tooooo slippery...I like the ones with holes... I now have 12 of these and I will not wear them..my wig keeps falling forward its terrible. Do you have any other wig cap available.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Granatelli

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: This wig cap is way too small! I could barely get it on and had to take it off because it squeezed my head. Maybe it was meant for a child to wear.
customer_reviews.author: El Louise

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfect for me, I tried it this weekend with my white wig and it worked great and didn't shift at all. Wish I had this when I did my first Cosplay. The only kind they sell around where I live is more like a net and it just doesn't keep my hair in it, this is more like a stocking which I prefer. Since my hair is dark brown, this light cap makes wearing light colored wigs easy. Planning on ordering more for myself and my sister for future costuming needs.
customer_reviews.author: Brynn

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected . . .
customer_reviews.text: The is basically a piece of panty hose that goes over my head. I have very thick curly hair and this does not contain even most of my hair. The price was not expensive, but I did expect it to hold all my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A. Currie

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe ?
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a sewn nylon stocking its ok but would not call it anything special such as DELUXE !
customer_reviews.author: MKJ

customer_reviews.title: Dream WiG Cap is a dream and Better than all the others
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching forever and finally found a soft, stretchable and big enough cap to go over two very long braids pinned to my head and hold them down firmly under my short wigs. It is perfect, came two in a pack and I will reorder half a dozen in case they ever go out of business or run out. It will make perfect gifts for my wig wearing loved ones. No more headaches or line marks in my brow. It is comfortable and the right scalp color for my wig part to make it look natural.
customer_reviews.author: H Howard Rothschild

product_meta.title: DREAM Deluxe Wig Cap Natural 2 pc (Model: 097NA)
